name: Carrot thief
description:
Carrot thief is simple turn base puzzle game.You play as rabbit try to steal carrots from the farmers.

Control
  • arrow keys or wasd to move u can move in diagonal directions
  • z to use dig skill to show up anywhere in the map
Credit
  • engine Godot Engine
  • Sound Effect with Chiptone
  • Background music from three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
